des: "Tofu topped with cherry tomatoes, pesto, fresh basil, and Gorgonzola cheese.  This is served cold and is a perfect springtime meal. If prepared pesto is hard to find, use a mix and prepare according to package directions. "
ins: Drain the tofu and slice horizontally into 4 slices. Pat each slice dry and place on a serving plate. Divide the tomatoes evenly amongst the tofu portions. Top each with about 2 tablespoons of basil pesto and 1/4 cup of Gorgonzola cheese. Garnish with fresh basil leaves. Serve cold.
